name: Garlic Butter Lemon Sous Vide Prawns
description: Tender, juicy prawns cooked sous vide with garlic, butter, and lemon for a perfectly balanced flavor.
instructions: Preheat a sous vide water bath to 54째C (129째F) for tender prawns or 57째C (135째F) for a firmer texture.
If frozen, rinse prawns under cold water to remove excess ice. Pat dry.
Place prawns in a vacuum-seal bag or zip-lock freezer bag with butter, garlic, salt, black pepper, red pepper flakes (if using), olive oil, and lemon zest. Seal the bag.
Sous vide the prawns for 40 minutes if frozen or 25 minutes if thawed.
Heat a skillet over medium-high heat.
Remove prawns from the bag and pour the contents into the skillet.
Sear for 30-60 seconds per side to develop some color.
Add lemon juice and toss to coat.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve immediately.
